'''1.3.2'''<ref>https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/29554961741/minecraft-132</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} released on August 16, 2012, to fix various bugs and crashes in [[Java Edition 1.3.1|1.3.1]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2012/08/no-snapshot-but-updates/|title=No Snapshot, But Updates|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=August 16, 2012}}</ref>

A pre-release version of 1.3.2 was released on August 14, 2012, for players to test,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2012/08/cobalt-v107a-and-minecraft-1-3-2/|title=Cobalt v107a and Minecraft 1.3.2|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=August 14, 2012}}</ref> though the full release of 1.3.2 is identical to this pre-release.

== Changes ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[Tree]]s'''
* Large oak trees now generate with sideways logs.

=== General ===
'''Server list'''
* The player can now toggle showing server addresses in the server list by pressing {{key|F1}}.

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed players sometimes falling out of the world when entering the Nether if the player has been there before in the same session.<ref>{{tweet|jeb|233480472989167616|@EdvinTot @Dinnerbone I think @EvilSeph is working on it. We'll probably do a 1.3.2 to patch it|August 9, 2012}}</ref>
* Fixed players taking damage when water or players push them into corners.
* Fixed various uncommon crash bugs.
* Fixed players not getting fall damage when falling from a height of 4 blocks.<!-- previously said "assuming" so [citation needed] -->
